queries.channels: SELECT DISTINCT channels.ensg, gating_mechanism, carried_solute, (pore_loops > 0) AS pore_forming FROM channels LEFT JOIN (SELECT pore_loops, role, ensg FROM structure) AS structure ON structure.ensg = channels.ensg;
queries.channels_no_pores: SELECT DISTINCT channels.ensg, gating_mechanism, carried_solute FROM channels;
queries.solute_carriers: SELECT DISTINCT solute_carriers.ensg, carried_solute, port_type, is_secondary, direction FROM solute_carriers;
